description.full: Feel the rush with the exhilarating dance-fitness sequel to the original global smash hit! Get your body rockin’ with a red-hot blend of contagious choreography set to Zumba® music plus electrifying tracks by Pitbull, Nicole Scherzinger and more. Party yourself into shape with 42 all new routines and 24 international dance styles, from Bollywood to Merengue to Hip-Hop. Tons of Kinect exclusive features take your workout to the next level: more music, venues and superstar Zumba® instructors, plus voice control. Follow your progress with the new calorie tracker and customize your entire workout. Dance hands-free with Kinect technology and play together with a friend to amp up your living room party. Download the free demo now!
description.short: Feel the rush with the exhilarating dance-fitness sequel to the original smash hit. Zumba® Fitness Rush features contagious choreography, new hit music, 24 dance styles and  a wealth of Kinect exclusive features including more routines, venues and instructors plus voice control. Download the free demo now!
